law.full_text:
SURCHARGE FOR ONE-STOP PERMIT CENTER. (Amended by Ord. No. 173,268, Eff. 7/1/00, Oper. 7/1/00.)
There shall be added to each fee imposed for any permit, license or application provided for in this article a surcharge in an amount equal to the greater of two percent of the fee or $1.00.

LOS ANGELES MUNICIPAL CODE
SURCHARGE FOR ONE-STOP PERMIT CENTER. (§ 19.08)
